summary:
Adaptable professional | Project Management | Market Research | Change Management

Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I thrive in flexible, fast-paced environments and bring a unique blend of project management and change management experience.

🌍 Internships: ILIAS Solutions (Project Management) 📊 KVE Composites (Market Research)
🎓 Bachelor's in International Business, Management
🎓 Master's in Change Management and Consultancy (Graduating this week!)

At ILIAS Solutions, I actively contributed as a Project Officer, gaining expertise in planning, execution, and monitoring.
At KVE Composites, I delved into market research, analyzing consumer behavior and market trends.

Passionate about collaborating with diverse teams, solving complex problems, and driving positive change within organizations.

Let's connect and make meaningful business connections! Reach out to explore opportunities or discuss industry trends.

profile_positions.description:
As a Sales Advisor at KVE Composites, I focus on internal sales processes and contract review within the organization. My primary role is to ensure the smooth execution of the sales process and facilitate an efficient contract review process. Working closely with various departments within the company, I streamline communication and coordination to support the sales team in achieving their goals.

One of my key responsibilities is to oversee the contract review process. I meticulously review contracts, identifying any potential issues or discrepancies, and collaborate with the relevant internal teams to address them promptly. By ensuring accuracy and completeness in contracts, I contribute to minimizing risks and ensuring compliance within the organization.

Additionally, I provide valuable support and insights to the sales team, assisting them in navigating the sales process effectively. By maintaining clear communication channels and fostering strong internal relationships, I contribute to the overall effectiveness and efficiency of our sales operations. Through my attention to detail, organizational skills, and ability to work collaboratively, I strive to optimize internal sales processes and ensure all stakeholders receive the necessary support throughout the sales cycle.

As a Sales Advisor at KVE Composites, I am proud to be part of a team that drives growth and success. I am dedicated to optimizing internal sales operations, delivering exceptional results, and playing a pivotal role in the company's continued achievements.
profile_positions.title: Sales Advisor

profile_positions.description:
During the Covid-19 pandemic, I had the invaluable opportunity to work as a Market Research Intern at KVE Composites, where I conducted interviews to understand the impact of Covid-19 on the worldwide aviation market. Focusing on widebody, narrow body, and jet airplanes, I gained firsthand insights into the challenges faced by airlines and manufacturers in this unprecedented time. 

Through extensive interviews with industry professionals, I analyzed market trends, evaluated changing consumer behaviors, and examined the evolving demands and challenges within the aviation industry. This experience not only honed my research and analytical skills but also provided me with a deep appreciation for the power of market research in informing strategic decisions. It reinforced my passion for understanding market dynamics and driving positive change within organizations. 

Working on this project during the Covid-19 pandemic allowed me to witness the resilience and adaptability of the aviation industry firsthand. Despite the disruption, I witnessed the industry's commitment to finding innovative solutions and adapting to the new normal. Armed with this experience, I am ready to apply my knowledge and insights to make a meaningful impact in the field of market research, and contribute to driving the recovery and future growth of the aviation industry.
profile_positions.title: Market Research Intern

profile_positions.description: During the first semester of my third year in the International Business program at Zuyd University of Applied Sciences, I embarked on a transformative internship journey. As a Project Officer, I meticulously planned, documented, and controlled project-related documents. This internship took me to Almere (Netherlands), Brussels (Belgium), and Taichung (Taiwan), exposing me to diverse international business perspectives and practices. It deepened my understanding of conducting business on a global scale and fostered my ability to thrive in dynamic environments. Grateful for these experiences, I am now excited to apply my knowledge and international perspective to future endeavors.
profile_positions.title: Project Officer
